title: Zero-interest-penalty CD Token
description: There is currently no sufficiently secure and audible stable token in existence nor is there a standard for their issuance.
solution: Credit unions and banks are regulated and insured by the NCUA and FDIC respectively and can issue certificates of deposit as on-chain coins.
experience: I was in the first cohort of Plutus Pioneers and am in the class photo (blue shirt, lower left-hand side). I am an entrepreneur.
